name: Vasantiria
description:
Description:

Vasantiria is a terror game that puts you in the shoes of a little ghost girl trying to escape from her captors, which have abducted her for her strange ability of being able to haunt paintings. Explore this maze of terror while you avoid enemies and find your way out.

Controls:

- WASD to move around

- Space to interact

- Space near glowing paintints to "haunt" them

Authors:

- Manuel Duro Santos

- Jordi Muñoz Besserer

- Pol Fernàndez Guerra

- Alejandro Costa Rueda

- Joel Ramos Cano
